mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.floor AS "floor", a.jiffy_stand AS "jiffyStand", a.space AS "space", a.isuse AS "isuse", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
select floor,jiffy_stand,sum(1) as count, sum(case when isuse='0' then 1 else 0 end) as idle_count , group_concat(case when isuse='0' then null else id end) as inuse_spaces, group_concat(case when isuse='1' then null else id end) as idle_spaces from park_space a
a.del_flag = '0'
group by jiffy_stand,floor
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO park_space( id, floor, jiffy_stand, space, isuse, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{floor}, #{jiffyStand}, #{space}, #{isuse}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE park_space SET floor = #{floor}, jiffy_stand = #{jiffyStand}, space = #{space}, isuse = #{isuse}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
